title: Carve Out A New Life At Mosaic Apartments
neighborhood: 5600 N Beach St Haltom City, TX
posting_body: We now book our tour appointments online!
Please call or text us at
Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!

Mosaic is a charming community surrounded by natural beauty and lush landscaping perfectly placed in the heart of the Fossil Creek neighborhood located in Haltom City which is just 15 minutes of downtown Fort Worth.
Knightvest Communities are pet friendly communities.
We implement a 2 pet limit per apartment home.
The following policy is in place to assist in maintaining a healthy and attractive community.
Please contact the Management office in the event you have any questions concerning this policy.
NOT APPROVED - but not limited to:- Pit Bull Terriers - Staffordshire Terriers - Rottweilers- German Shepherd - Presa Canarios - Chows Chows- Doberman Pinschers - Akitas - Wolf-hybrids-
Mastiffs - Cane Corsos - Great Danes- Alaskan Malamutes - Siberian HuskiesIncluding any mix of the breeds listed above.
